articles.title: Erik ten Hag takes thinly-veiled dig at Man Utd board to explain Alejandro Garnacho sub - The Mirror
articles.description: Alejandro Garnacho was only introduced as Manchester United's second substitute of the match in stoppage time after Eddie Nketiah had effectively won the game for Arsenal
articles.content:
Erik ten Hag directed a thinly-veiled message to Manchester United's board over his "limited" attacking options after losing 3-2 to Arsenal on Sunday. 
 The Red Devils saw their faint title hopes qu… [+3865 chars]
